ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate (was:RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate  weapon?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Last night after the event ended, a few friends and I were looking for undead to gain experience off.  Most con d either red, yellow, or blue to my 30
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> Anyone been in Kithicor since? I am very curious what I will wake up to
> find there and how I will escape level 40+ mobs when I am camped about dead
> center of the zone.

Last night after the event ended, a few friends and I were looking for
undead to gain experience off. Most con'd either red, yellow, or blue to
my 30 (mostly yellow of what I saw) from passing through earlier, but when
we ventured there none showed on track (34 ranger). We set up shop down
by the commons zone and the ranger ran circles searching for stuff, to no
avail.

Then nightfall came.

Not far from where I was, a skeleton trooper appeared. I said, 'skel
trooper spawn,' as someone shot an arrow at it. 'It' turned out to be
four, two of which headed straight for me, to be followed by the other two
after Selo's pulsed. I was hit for maybe 100, along with a bunch of
misses, when I suddenly dropped dead. No backstabs, no criticals, no harm
touch, just plain dead. I got a res, then while waiting for my group to
finish a fight I was jumped by an ghoul cleric or something and lost
connection to server, and we all know how if you lose your connection in a
fight it's interpreted by the server as you dying (bitter? nah).

I'm off to Kithicor from Halas now. My advice to you would be check what
time it is before logging Kitasi in. -.-

Athren Notechaser, feelin like his armor
